name: Meeting of Light and Fire
text:
Quickcast
Choose one, if you control a light J/resonator and another fire J/resonator, you may choose both - Reveal the top card of your deck. You gain 100 life multiplied by the total cost of the card revealed this way. Put that card into your hand; or reveal the top card of your deck. This card deals 100 damage multiplied by the total cost of the card revealed this way to your opponent. Put that card into your hand.
